creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: triangular shaped cluster of butterflies; saturated hues of purple, blue, teal, and yellow; neutral background with orange fade along top
marks:
Signature, Title, Date, and Mark
 
bottom margin, in pencil: [明けの蝶 (ake no chō) / 6
title: Morning Butterflies
